message.content:
def transform(sequence):
    sequence = list(sequence)
    first_non_zero_index = next((i for i, x in enumerate(sequence) if x !='0'), None)
    last_non_zero_index = len(sequence) - next((i for i, x in enumerate(reversed(sequence)) if x != '0'), None) - 1
    prefix_zeros = '0'*first_non_zero_index
    non_zero_part = sequence[first_non_zero_index:last_non_zero_index+1]
    non_zero_part = [x for x in non_zero_part if x != '0'][::-1]
    suffix_zeros = '0'*(len(sequence)-last_non_zero_index-1)
    new_sequence = prefix_zeros + ''.join(non_zero_part) + suffix_zeros
    return new_sequence

    sequence = list(sequence)
    first_non_zero_index = next((i for i, x in enumerate(sequence) if x !='0'), None)
    last_non_zero_index = len(sequence) - next((i for i, x in enumerate(reversed(sequence)) if x != '0'), None) - 1
    prefix_zeros = '0'*first_non_zero_index
    non_zero_part = sequence[first_non_zero_index:last_non_zero_index+1]
    non_zero_part = [x for x in non_zero_part if x != '0'][::-1]
    suffix_zeros = '0'*(len(sequence)-last_non_zero_index-1)
    new_sequence = (prefix_zeros + 
                    ''.join(non_zero_part) + 
                    suffix_zeros + 
                    '0'*(last_non_zero_index-first_non_zero_index+1-len(non_zero_part)))
    return "".join(new_sequence).

the original sequence "000022220900000000" is transformed into "000000000902222000", the original sequence "000555550900000000" is transformed into "000000000905555500", the original sequence "066666090000000000" is transformed into "000000090666660000"

def transform(sequence):
    sequence = list(sequence)
    first_non_zero_index = next((i for i, x in enumerate(sequence) if x !='0'), None)
    last_non_zero_index = len(sequence) - next((i for i, x in enumerate(reversed(sequence)) if x != '0'), None) - 1
    prefix_zeros = '0'*first_non_zero_index
    non_zero_part = sequence[first_non_zero_index:last_non_zero_index+1]
    non_zero_part = [x for x in non_zero_part if x != '0'][::-1]
    suffix_zeros = '0'*(len(sequence)-last_non_zero_index-1)
    new_sequence = prefix_zeros + ''.join(non_zero_part) + suffix_zeros
    return new_sequence
